title: Update fail
body: any of you have this prob ?

replies.body: To get a better idea of your issue, I need some more specifics on what is happening exactly.  Is this the live or updated client?  Is this during a patching update, and at what percent is it occurring? Let me know or even spare some screenshots.  Happy to help!

It sounds like an issue on your end! As it's one of the only problems I've seen on the boards. Have you tried clearing out the Riot Games folder from your drive which it is installed and trying a full install again?
